name: World War III: Ghost War
description:
You are the last hope of the ghost realm after an evil ghost took control of this universe every ghost got corrupted but only you had the purest heart and now it is your duty to beat the evil ghost that destroyed the ghost real.
This is my first Ludum Dare I participate and I know the game could had been better but I am still happy how game turned out.
I hope you will enjoy this game.

For more exciting things you can follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Aticora_Games

HOW TO PLAY:

Use A/D - To move right/left

Use Space - To jump

Right Mouse click - To shoot little parts of your soul/hold it for a little time to get a stronger parts of your soul

Use G - To activate special ability

SOME MINOR BUG FIXES I MADE:
Now Images scale with screen

Fixed the bug that stopped player to restart.

Fixed the bug that stopped loading last scene of the game.
